page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: PRIMARY:{Coleby}C.E. School serves both villages,since{Harmston}School closed in August 1983. Old buildings provide less than perfect facilities, but the 2 staff with 1 part_timer teach, with devotion, the 40+ children aged 5_11yrs,over a broad progressive curriculum. Pre_School play_groups are available in nearby villages. Five children are educated privately. SECONDARY:Children 11_18yrs attend the large(1000+) purpose built compre_ hensive(5 form entry) set in the North Hykeham Community Centre 3_5 miles away.Most children leave after their exams at 16,the rest taking 'A'Levels at 18. ADULT:Self_sponsored education is available in a wide choice of LEA classes, especially at N.Hykeham & Lincoln, where there are also WEA and OU centres and an Adult Literacy Base.
